aptitudes.name: Ionize
aptitudes.text: Everytime a weapon action from Ion Shot deals critical damage, add a power token to Scildan.

aptitudes.name: Discharge
aptitudes.text: Everytime a weapon action from Shield Bash deals damage, add +1 damage per power token on Scildan. Remove all power tokens from Scildan.

aptitudes.name: Force Push
aptitudes.text: Everytime a weapon action from Shield Bash deals critical damage, move the ennemy figure one space back from Scildan. If this is not possible for any reaons, the ennemy figure takes 1 damage instead.

aptitudes.name: Thunder Charge (6+)
aptitudes.text: Once per turn, advance up to 3 squares in a straight line to come adjacent to an ennemy. Perform immediatly a free Shield Bash action. Regardless of the outcome, you can apply Force Push even if you missed your Shield Bash (2+).
